GaugeText.GaugeString:
%((A:TITLE,string))%!s!%
 %( 'Gross Weight ' )%!s!%	%((A:TOTAL WEIGHT,pounds) )%!5d!%( ' Lbs' )%!s!%
 %( 'Max Weight ' )%!s!%	%((A:MAX GROSS WEIGHT,pounds) )%!5d!%( ' Lbs' )%!s!%
 %( 'Payload ' )%!s!%	%((A:TOTAL WEIGHT,pounds) (A:EMPTY WEIGHT,pounds) - (A:FUEL TOTAL QUANTITY WEIGHT,pounds) - )%!5d!%( ' Lbs' )%!s!%
 %( 'Fuel ' )%!s!%	%((A:FUEL TOTAL QUANTITY,gallon) )%!5d!%( ' Gallon' )%!s!%
 %((A:TOTAL WEIGHT,pounds) (A:MAX GROSS WEIGHT,pounds) - 0 > )%{if} \{rev}%( ' Overweight ' )%!s!%	%((A:TOTAL WEIGHT,pounds) (A:MAX GROSS WEIGHT,pounds) - )%!5d!%( ' Lbs ' )%!s!%\{nr}%{end}

Element.Visibility: (A:WATER RUDDER HANDLE POSITION, percent) 50 > (A:SIM ON GROUND, bool) *
